# Pull Request Checklist

## Summary
Brief description of what this PR changes and why.

## Checklist
- [ ] Preflight passes locally (`./scripts/dev/preflight.sh`)
- [ ] Tests pass or are explicitly skipped with rationale
- [ ] No unintended API contract changes
- [ ] Docs updated (if behavior or roles changed)
- [ ] Prisma schema changes documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual smoke test performed (curl or UI)

## Testing Performed
Describe how this was tested.

## Notes / Follow-ups
Anything reviewers should know.
